attributes.action: Britin should leave the European Union!
attributes.additional_details:
In the 21st century the majority of valuable commercial business contracts to the Uk are with the USA, Pakistan, India, Africa, and the Middle East. Viable business generated from central Europe is now minimal in comparison to the countries mentioned above.

Bearing in mind the annual cost of membership of the Europoean Union ( £56 + billion sterling back in the year 2008)  it is now time to say that it is too expensive.........it is time to leave! Let us leave the European Union and cencentrate on our profitable economic business partners instead.
